title: "Here are some plots"
output: 
  html_document
---

we often make plots in data science

Here's the tidyverse.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Here's a data frame

```{r}
plot_df =
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(100, mean = 1, sd = 2),
    y = 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(100)
  )
```


```{r}
plot_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
